about_the_game: Itching to give Blipz a whirl? Why not give the demo a shot. Get a taste of what's coming with one full game mode, cool stats, and 8 unlockables. More to come soon!
detailed_description: Itching to give Blipz a whirl? Why not give the demo a shot. Get a taste of what's coming with one full game mode, cool stats, and 8 unlockables. More to come soon!
name: Blipz Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 And Later
  • Processor: A Processor From The Dollar Store
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Can You Run Minesweeper?
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
